descriptionHTML:
Android wear notepad. You can take your notes fast and easy with Notepad.

*Within 2 hours of purchase
You can usually return any app or game within 2 hours for a full refund.

Features
*Take notes
*Text to speech
*Note Copy

Additional informations:
Speak Write feature requires internet connection.


note, wear note, notepad, notebook
comments: Works. Few changes would be nice. Works on my moto 360 1st gen. (S7 phone) swipe to the left to see your notes from the app, or just tap the large button to add another. Would like to be prompted for title first. Or have some sort of auto title (such as date and time) rather than take the note then the title. Just lacks some customizability.

Not working on my Nexus 6p/ urbane2, doesn't open, freezes on main screen and error on my phone, I just reinstalled it again to test and still the same thing.  perhaps it doesn't work with the latest android 6 update
